remarks: The lower two-dimensional axiom.  In any space where the dimension is greater than one, there are three non-colinear points.  Axiom A8 of [Schwabhauser] p. 12.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 15-Apr-2013.)
statement:
axlowdim2 $p |- ( N e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) -> E. x e. ( EE ` N ) E. y e. ( EE ` N ) E. z e. ( EE ` N ) -. ( x Btwn <. y , z >. \/ y Btwn <. z , x >. \/ z Btwn <. x , y >. ) ) $.
$d N x y z $.
